description: This file defines a utility object 'SplitUtils' that provides a method to split a string into tokens based on spaces, returning a linked list of valid tokens.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: An object providing string splitting utility functions.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a string into tokens based on spaces and returns a linked list of valid tokens.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid (non-empty).

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is valid (not empty).
